entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 30%
